ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Medley Overhaul
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought this all changed when they made cancel magic an offensive spell. Guess I was wrong, wouldn t be the first time that s for sure.  I thought they made
ygData.messageBody:
I thought this all changed when they made cancel magic an offensive spell.
Guess I was wrong, wouldn't be the first time that's for sure. I thought
they made debuffs all aggro'ing spells. Can't wait to try this out.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 11:56 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Medley Overhaul


Largo's is a straight DEBUFF with no DoT effect. Straight Debuff's have
never broken Mez. In fact, Enchanters themselves often use a "Mez, Debuff,
DOT, FEAR" combo when soloing. The DOT pulls the target to them, the fear
chases it off with their pet wailing on it.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 1:10 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Medley Overhaul


> Binding doesn't break mez???? really???? Damn, wish I had known that.
It
> would have saved me a lot of deaths in Sol A if I could have slowed those
> gobbies down since they were all beating on me anyhow every time the
> enchanter got a resist. I would never have guessed that Largo's didn't
> break mez.
>
> Kit
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 11:05 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Medley Overhaul
>
>
> On Mon, 10 Apr 2000, Katy Westerman wrote:
> > groups, I tend to just go with what I know: Celerity/Chant/Chains in
> battle
> > and Clarity/Hymn in downtime with a lute, Charm if there's one or two
> extra
> > mobs, Pixie for more. I get really confused if there's a snarer or an
> > enchanter, usually switching Chains or Celerity for Fufil's but leaving
> them
> > memorized just in case. In larger groups, the mobs go down so fast that
> >
> > I've started to wonder if I'm working up to my full potential. I'm
> getting
> > to the point now where Charm is not as useful and my buffs don't play
nice
> > with everyone else's. I'm starting to feel a little useless except as a
> > crack dealer. Can anyone help me out here?
>
> The Chants are fixed now - give them a whirl. There's a
> strong possibility you'll never want to use your weapons again
> (well, until you run into a spite golem :). Before the Chant
> series was fixed, the only other real alternative was the
> Psalms for the damage shield. Binding also is useful at times
> since it doesn't break snare nor mez. It *may* prevent some
> lower level slowdowns from sticking however. But in most
> cases when facing multiple mobs, slowing down 5 mobs until the
> enchanter can get them mezed is more useful than slowing down
> just the one mob that the group is fighting.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
>
